snippet: A day after The Times reported that Chinese hackers had infiltrated its computers, The Wall Street Journal said it was coping with a similar attack.
abstract: Wall Street Journal reports that its network was attacked by Chinese hackers who were attempting to monitor company's coverage of China; announcement comes day after New York Times reports similar hacking.

byline.contributor: Michael Gordon contributed reporting from Washington.

lead_paragraph: A day after The Times reported that Chinese hackers had infiltrated its computers, The Wall Street Journal said it was coping with a similar attack.

headline.seo: Wall Street Journal Reports Attack by China Hackers
headline.main: Wall Street Journal Announces That It, Too, Was Hacked by the Chinese
headline.print_headline: Wall Street Journal Announces That It Was Hacked by the Chinese, Too
